techniques.name: Elemental Arrow
techniques.description: A ranged attack that deals STR+INT dmg, as well as a varying effect based on your element.

techniques.name: Twin Daggers
techniques.description: Melee Attack that inflicts STR+(INTx1.5) dmg (must have a melee weapon equipped).

techniques.name: Arrow Regen
techniques.description: Restores your SPB to full capacity.

techniques.name: Quick Draw
techniques.description: This technique allows you to change your weapon without using up an action (this technique doesn’t count as an action either).

techniques.name: Double Attack
techniques.description: Can use 2 more techniques (not including this one) as part of a single action (could use up to 4 additional techniques in one turn if Double Attack is used twice and you don’t move).

techniques.name: Triple Attack
techniques.description: Can use 3 more techniques (not including this one) as part of a single action.

techniques.name: Area Effect Shot
techniques.description: A ranged attack that inflicts dmg equal to your STR in a 2x2 space square.

techniques.name: Advanced Area Effect Shot
techniques.description: A ranged attack that inflicts dmg equal to your STR+INT in a 2x2 space square.

techniques.name: Life Drain
techniques.description: A ranged attack that inflicts INTx1 dmg to the enemy and converts an amount equal to the dmg inflicted into HP for the Archer.

techniques.name: Advanced Life Drain
techniques.description: A ranged attack that inflicts INTx2 dmg to the enemy and converts an amount equal to the dmg inflicted into HP for the Archer (requires Life Drain).

techniques.name: Relane 1
techniques.description: Restores your own HP or the HP of an ally by INTx1.

techniques.name: Relane 2
techniques.description: Restores your own HP or the HP of an ally by INTx2, or can heal all friendly heroes in range by INTx1.

techniques.name: Relane 3
techniques.description: Restores your own HP or the HP of an ally by INTx3, or can heal all friendly heroes within a range of 5 by INTx1.

techniques.name: Call Leokiri
techniques.description: Summons 1 Leokiri to fight for the Cleric for the rest of the battle or until it is defeated.

techniques.name: Call Leokara
techniques.description: Summons 1 Leokara to fight for the Cleric for the rest of the battle or until it is defeated.

techniques.name: Call Leokoro
techniques.description: Summons 1 Leokoro to fight for the Cleric for the rest of the battle or until it is defeated.

techniques.name: Revive
techniques.description: Revives an unconscious ally and restores 1/2 maxHP, or the Cleric may use on itself once per battle at the moment their HP is reduced to 0.

techniques.name: Carax
techniques.description: Out of battle (on the Overworld) you can teleport to the location of an ally or teleport an ally to you. In battle you can teleport yourself, an ally, or an enemy up to 5 spaces in any direction. If an enemy is teleported outside the area of the battle board, this results in the enemy disappearing from the battle (This doesn’t work on bosses and you don’t gain EXP from enemies who are teleported out of the battle).

techniques.name: Frekor
techniques.description: Element-dependent attribute bonus for 5 turns. Each hero may only have one of these bonuses at a time. Fire-STR increased by ½ INT, Water-INT increased by ½ INT, Air- +2 movement spaces, Earth-doubles the dmg reduction of a hero‘s armor (if no armor is equipped, gives the hero an armor value of 3).

techniques.name: Grahkil
techniques.description: Does dmg equal to the Cleric’s INTx1.

techniques.name: Wind Lvl 1
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx1 dmg to 1 enemy.

techniques.name: Wind Lvl 2
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx2 dmg to 1 enemy.

techniques.name: Wind Lvl 3
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx3 dmg to 1 enemy.

techniques.name: Float
techniques.description: Doubles the number of spaces an ally can move, and prevents enemies within 3 spaces of the ally from getting critical hits or using techniques. Lasts for 3 turns.

techniques.name: Cyclone
techniques.description: If an enemy moves while being affected by Cyclone, INTx1/2 dmg is inflicted. Also if the enemy touches (is adjacent to) any other enemies while being affected, those enemies also receive INTx1/2 dmg (once per turn). The effects of Cyclone last for 3 turns.

techniques.name: Gale
techniques.description: INTx3 dmg to all enemies and renders all surviving enemies immobile (unable to move) for 3 turns. Also costs 10 SP

techniques.name: Lightning Lvl 1
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx1 minus 5 dmg to 1 enemy which is then paralyzed (must roll two dice when attempting to move. Combinations of 4, 5, and 6 allow it to move). Lasts for 4 turns.

techniques.name: Lightning Lvl 2
techniques.description: Inlficts INTx2 minus 10 dmg to 1 enemy which is then paralyzed (must roll two dice when attempting to move. Combinations of 5 and 6 allow it to move). Lasts for 4 turns.

techniques.name: Lightning Lvl 3
techniques.description: Inlficts INTx3 minus 20 dmg to 1 enemy which is then paralyzed (must roll two dice when attempting to move. A roll of two 6s allows it to move). Lasts for 4 turns.

techniques.name: Cloud
techniques.description: All dmg dealt by Air techniques is boosted x 1.5 for 4 turns.

techniques.name: Shock
techniques.description: The Magician places a shield on one ally that causes all melee attacking enemies to receive INTx1/2 dmg when they attack the hero with the shield. Lasts for 3 turns.

techniques.name: Thunderstorm
techniques.description: Each turn for the next 3 turns, you may deal INTx2 dmg to one enemy of your choice.  These attacks do not take one of your actions.

techniques.name: Rock Lvl 1
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx1 dmg to 1 enemy.

techniques.name: Rock Lvl 2
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx2 dmg to 1 enemy.

techniques.name: Rock Lvl 3
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx3 dmg to 1 enemy.

techniques.name: Statue
techniques.description: The target enemy is unable to take action or move for 2 turns.

techniques.name: Rock Shell
techniques.description: Prevents dmg to target hero from next two attacks.

techniques.name: Earthquake
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx3 dmg on all enemies and creates a straight line through the field at any location that cannot be crossed for 3 turns. Also costs 10 SP

techniques.name: Growth Lvl 1
techniques.description: Boosts target hero’s STR by 7 for 5 turns.

techniques.name: Growth Lvl 2
techniques.description: Boosts target hero’s STR by 15 for 5 turns.

techniques.name: Growth Lvl 3
techniques.description: Boosts target hero’s STR by 30 for 5 turns.

techniques.name: Awaken
techniques.description: Summons 2 Ghasts with the following attributes: HP:30 STR:10 AGI:15, which are under the player’s control for 4 turns before they dissipate. Ghasts are summoned within 2 spaces of the Magician.

techniques.name: Poison
techniques.description: Poisons 1 enemy, dealing 1/4 of its maxHP in dmg each turn for 3 turns. Does not work on bosses.

techniques.name: Nature's Blessing
techniques.description: Doubles the STR and Defense of all allies for 4 turns.

techniques.name: Flame Lvl 1
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx1 dmg to 1 enemy.

techniques.name: Flame Lvl 2
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx2 dmg to 1 enemy.

techniques.name: Flame Lvl 3
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx3 dmg to 1 enemy.

techniques.name: Firewall
techniques.description: Adds the value of 3 multiplied by the Magician’s current magic level to his DEF (even if it’s currently at 0) or the DEF of one ally for 5 turns.

techniques.name: Inner Fire
techniques.description: Boost STR and AGI of any hero by the value of the Magician’s current magic level multiplied by 4 for 4 turns.

techniques.name: Inferno
techniques.description: Does INTx5 dmg on one target. Also costs 10 SP

techniques.name: Smoke Lvl 1
techniques.description: Lowers two enemies’ STR and AGI values by 2 each for 3 turns.

techniques.name: Smoke Lvl 2
techniques.description: Lowers two enemies’ STR and AGI values by 5 each for 3 turns.

techniques.name: Smoke Lvl 3
techniques.description: Lowers three enemies’ STR and AGI values by 11 each for 3 turns.

techniques.name: Brekar
techniques.description: Move 1 non-boss enemy 5 spaces

techniques.name: Fog
techniques.description: Target non-boss enemy misses with any rolling combinations of 1, 2, 3, or 4 for 4 turns.

techniques.name: Haze Strike
techniques.description: Does INTx3 dmg on all enemies, halves one non-boss enemy’s STR for 3 turns or a boss's for 1 turn, and makes all affected non-boss enemies miss with a roll of any combination of 1, 2, 3, or 4 for 3 turns.

techniques.name: Aqua Lvl 1
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx1 dmg to 1 enemy.

techniques.name: Aqua Lvl 2
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx2 dmg to 1 enemy.

techniques.name: Aqua Lvl 3
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx3 dmg to 1 enemy.

techniques.name: Breath
techniques.description: Increases range of the attacks and techniques of the targeted hero by 2 (including regular weapon attacks) for 3 turns.

techniques.name: Flash Flood
techniques.description: All characters (friendly and enemy) may move only one space, unless breath is cast on them, for 4 turns (if Breath is cast on a unit, it may move as many using its regular movement.

techniques.name: Tsunami
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx3 dmg to all enemies, then continues to deal INTx1 dmg to all enemies for 2 additional turns. Also costs 10 SP

techniques.name: Ice Lvl 1
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx1 minus 5 dmg to 1 enemy, and decreases its AGI by 6 for 3 turns, effects can stack.

techniques.name: Ice Lvl 2
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx2 minus 12 dmg to 1 enemy, and decreases its AGI by 12 for 3 turns, effects can stack.

techniques.name: Ice Lvl 3
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx3 minus 25 dmg to 1 enemy, and decreases its AGI by 18 for 3 turns, effects can stack.

techniques.name: Freeze
techniques.description: Enemy (non-boss) is frozen and unable to take action or move until it has been attacked (by either a weapon or technique) or until 3 turns have passed.

techniques.name: Frost Armor
techniques.description: Doubles an ally’s defense or raises it by 2 for 4 turns, effects do not stack.

techniques.name: Blizzard
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx3 dmg on all enemies, and freezes the surviving enemies. A frozen enemy is unable to take action until it has been attacked (by either a weapon or technique) or until 3 turns have past.

techniques.name: Strike 1
techniques.description: inflicts INTx½ dmg to 1 enemy. This technique may be used in addition to a regular attack without taking up an extra turn.  Thus the warrior could attack and use Strike Lvl 1, then attack again and use Strike Lvl 2 all in one turn.

techniques.name: Strike 2
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx1 dmg to 1 enemy. This technique may be used in addition to a regular attack without taking up an extra turn.  Thus the warrior could attack and use Strike Lvl 1, then attack again and use Strike Lvl 2 all in one turn.

techniques.name: Strike 3
techniques.description: Inflicts INTx1½ dmg to 1 enemy. This technique may be used in addition to a regular attack without taking up an extra turn.  Thus the warrior could attack and use Strike Lvl 1, then attack again and use Strike Lvl 2 all in one turn.

techniques.name: Cyclone
techniques.description: Attacks all adjacent enemies (including those in diagonally adjacent spaces) for STRx1

techniques.name: Counter
techniques.description: For the next 3 times the warrior is attacked, he or she is able to attack back (if the enemy is within the warrior's range),

techniques.name: Lunge
techniques.description: For the next 3 times the ]warrior is attacked, he or she is able to attack back (if the enemy is within the warrior's range),

techniques.name: Defensive stance
techniques.description: Increases the warrior's armor by INTx½ for 3 turns

techniques.name: Offensive Stance
techniques.description: Increases the warrior's STR by INTx1 for 3 turns

techniques.name: Aura
techniques.description: The effect of this technique is determined by the warrior's element.

techniques.name: Air Aura
techniques.description: For the next 3 turns, enemies attacking the warrior will miss with any attack roll combination of 1, 2, or 3.

techniques.name: Earth Aura
techniques.description: The next two enemies who attack the warrior become more susceptible to attacks for 2 turns.  During this time, they receive additional dmg equal to the warrior's INTx1 each time they are attacked.

techniques.name: Fire Aura
techniques.description: Decreases the strength of the next two enemies who attack by INTx1 for 2 turns.

techniques.name: Water Aura
techniques.description: Freezes the next two enemies who attack the warrior for 2 turns.  A frozen enemy may not move or take any action.  If a frozen enemy is attacked before the two turns are up, it is no longer frozen.

raceSoulForces.name: Over Limit
raceSoulForces.description: When you defeat an enemy, any excess dmg that would’ve been dealt (past 0 HP) to the enemy is converted into HP for the Aven. Over Limit’s effect lasts for the rest of the battle it is used in.

raceSoulForces.name: Precision Aiming
raceSoulForces.description: You will deal out a critical hit with any attack roll combination of 4, 5, or 6 (4-4, 4-5, 4-6, 5-5, 5-6, 6-6). Precision Aiming’s effect lasts for the rest of the battle it is used in.

raceSoulForces.name: Burrow
raceSoulForces.description: The Kyrek tunnels underground for two turns. While underground the Hero cannot take any actions and cannot be acted upon. The Kyrek regains 30 HP before resurfacing. You may choose to resurface in  any square within one space of where you burrowed.

raceSoulForces.name: Dual Strike
raceSoulForces.description: Attack twice with your weapon (uses up shots per battle if a ranged weapon is used).

raceSoulForces.name: Defensive Skin
raceSoulForces.description: This Soul Force blocks all dmg to your character for the next 3 turns. Once these turns are up, you will receive any dmg that would’ve been dealt by surviving enemies (dmg from enemies defeated up to this point is negated).

classSoulForces.name: Arrow Rain
classSoulForces.description: Attack 3 times with your ranged weapon (doesn’t use up your shots per battle).

classSoulForces.name: Reflection
classSoulForces.description: Places a shield on the Cleric for 4 turns or on all allies for 3 turns. When attacked while possessing the shield, the Cleric receives half dmg and half the dmg is reflected back dealing dmg to the enemy.

classSoulForces.name: Outbreak
classSoulForces.description: Inflicts INT+5 dmg on all enemies within a range of 5

classSoulForces.name: Crippling Blow
classSoulForces.description: Attack twice within a range of 3 and stun one enemy for 2 turns. The stunned enemy cannot move or attack. Crippling Blow does not stun bosses. Must defeat 10 enemies to charge Crippling Blow before each use.

tech.name: Ink Spatter
tech.desc: Used when doubles are rolled. Sprays the target hero with ink, causing it to miss with any attack-roll combination of 1, 2, or 3. Lasts for 3 turns.

tech.name: Electric Charge
tech.desc: Used when doubles are rolled. The Merman moves backwards from the target hero one space, and launches an electric missile, inflicting 17 dmg.

tech.name: Poison Dagger
tech.desc: Used when doubles are rolled. Inflicts 10 dmg and poisons the target hero for 3 turns.  Each successive turn, the poison deals 10 more dmg.

tech.name: Shadow Strike
tech.desc: Used when doubles are rolled. Teleports the Druin Shade next to his target and inflicts 1.5xSTR  dmg.

tech.name: Sap Sword
tech.desc: Used with all successful attacks. This technique isn't used with doubles. Every time the Druin Guard attacks he converts the same amount of dmg dealt into life for himself. His HP may not go above 110.

tech.name: Paralyzing Blow
tech.desc: Used when doubles are rolled. Katril deals a severe blow to the hero, inflicting 15 dmg and preventing any type of movement or action for 1 turn.

tech.name: Entangle
tech.desc: Used when doubles are rolled. Chelona Dracos grabs the target hero and prevents them from taking any action for 2 turns (for this time, the hero should be on the same space as Chelona Dracos, even when it moves). Also, any time Chelona Dracos is attacked, it receives only half of the dmg while half is dealt to the held hero.

tech.name: Healing Aura
tech.desc: At the beginning of each of Maktil’s turns, he restores 20 HP to himself and all other enemies. This technique is not used with doubles.

tech.name: Summon Spark Sprite
tech.desc: At the beginning of each of Jabnil’s turns, as long as there is no Spark Sprite currently in the battle, he creates one Spark Sprite.  This technique is not used with doubles.

tech.name: Explosion
tech.desc: When the Sprite attacks, it self-destructs, reducing its own HP to 0 and dealing 30 dmg to the targeted character.

tech.name: Aura of Duality
tech.desc: During this battle, all dmg that is dealt is doubled.  This technique is not used with doubles.

enemies.name: Rafel
enemies.mobs: 1 Druin Guard and 1 Narius per player

tech.name: Mystical Strike
tech.desc: Used when doubles are rolled. Rafel launches a deadly strike dealing 15 dmg to each player.

tech.name: Hemoglobin Imbibe
tech.desc: Used when doubles are rolled. Inflicts 10 dmg and transfers the amount of dmg dealt to the   Bat’s HP.  The Bat’s HP may increase above 30.

tech.name: Kamikaze
tech.desc: Used when doubles are rolled. Inflicts 25 dmg and reduces the Berserk Bat’s HP to 0.

tech.name: Vociferation
tech.desc: Used when doubles are rolled. Raises all enemies’ STR by 4 for 3 turns. Once per battle.

tech.name: Virility Accumulation
tech.desc: Adds 5 to the Ogre’s STR for the remainder of the battle. Then adds 2 more for every other monster on the field.  Lowers the other monsters’ STR by 2. Can be used once per battle.

tech.name: Blight
tech.desc: Used when doubles are rolled. The Nereid loses half of its current HP and inflicts 25 dmg to the target character.

tech.name: Rush
tech.desc: Used when doubles are rolled. Inflicts 10 dmg, and stuns the target character for one turn (the character can take no actions).

tech.name: Vigor Dimidiation
tech.desc: Used when doubles are rolled. Halves the character’s STR for 2 turns.

enemies.name: Belthog
enemies.special: When the Belthog attacks, the hero is knocked back one space.  If there is another character in the way, the hero is knocked down instead, and must use one action to get up at the beginning of his or her next turn.

tech.name: Slam
tech.desc: Used when doubles are rolled. The Belthog deals 30 dmg to all players within a range of 2 when doubles are rolled (does not have a critical hit with a roll of 5 & 6).

tech.name: Root Trammel
tech.desc: Used when doubles are rolled. Stops movement of one character for 2 turns.

enemies.name: Fire Guardian
enemies.mobs: 1 Druin Guard and 3 Dark Rangers per player

tech.name: Rage of the Inferno
tech.desc: This technique is not used with doubles. Whenever the Fire Guardian receives or inflicts dmg, his STR increases by 2. His STR cannot increase beyond 40.
